reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made, comfortable, and soft, with one noting it's not scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice & soft
items.body: Very comfortable & fits great. Read more
items.author: TP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for casual or dressy
items.body: I am absolutely in love with the MEROKEETY Women's Fall Open Front Waffle Knit Cardigan! This cozy sweater has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe, and I couldn't be happier with its fit, comfort, and versatility. The super soft fabric feels luxurious against the skin, and the stretchiness adds an extra level of comfort. The open-front design, ribbed trim at the closure, cuffs, and hem, along with the below-hip length, give this cardigan a stylish and cozy look. It's the perfect piece to throw on whether I'm dressing up for a casual day out or lounging at home. The long sleeves provide warmth, and the cardigan is just the right length to cover my butt while still providing good coverage in the front. One of the standout features for me is the functionality of the two side front pockets. They are strategically placed, adding convenience without creating unnecessary bulk around the hips. It's a thoughtful design that I appreciate, making the pockets both practical and stylish. I've found endless occasions to wear this cardigan. It's great for daily life, work, shopping, school, and even casual outings. The versatility of being able to dress it up or down makes it a go-to choice for various situations. Plus, it's ideal for the fall, winter, and spring seasons, providing just the right amount of warmth without being too heavy. The care instructions are another bonus. Machine washable with the recommendation to use a laundry bag ensures that maintenance is hassle-free. The durability of the fabric is evident, and it retains its softness even after washing. No bleach needed – it's a low-maintenance piece that still looks brand new. In conclusion, the MEROKEETY Women's Fall Open Front Waffle Knit Cardigan is a winner in every aspect. Comfortable, stylish, and versatile, it's a must-have for any wardrobe. I highly recommend this cardigan to anyone looking for a quality, go-to sweater for the upcoming fall and winter seasons. Read more
items.author: AvocadoAmazon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made, nice quality material.
items.body: Material was nice and thick. The color was spot on, as advertised. It looked well made. But, it runs very large. I am 110 lbs., 5'4" and the size small just swam on me. Overall too large. I had to return it. Read more
items.author: Kalgin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sweater Ever!
items.body: I love the style, fit and material! Read more
items.author: Sarah Helminiak

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and versatile — my new favorite cardigan
items.body: I needed a new black cardigan for work, since the temperature in my office is always changing, and this one has been perfect. The material is thicker but not heavy, so it feels warm and cozy without being bulky. I’m 5’3” and the medium falls just below my bum, which gives it a nice, flattering drape. It lays perfectly when I wear it — no awkward bunching or gaping. I usually wear a medium, and the fit was exactly what I expected: comfortable but not oversized. It’s soft enough to feel like a hug, yet looks polished enough for work. I’ve already worn it in my professional setting, but I also ended up keeping it on over the weekend with jeans because it works just as well for casual outfits. I love it so much that I’m planning to buy two more in other colors. If you’re looking for a versatile cardigan that’s cozy without looking sloppy, this one is a great Read more
items.author: Terry L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a thin cardigan at all!
items.body: It is a great cardigan and not thin at all. True to size. Read more
items.author: Kathy P

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars “Green” is closer to gray
items.body: The green color is really light and gray, more of a silvery grayish sage. Sweater is comfy but shapeless Read more
items.author: bluebird8

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t say anything bad about this sweater.
items.body: This Merokeety sweater is my favorite sweater for work everyday!! I have this in 5 colors and I’ll probably get more. I don’t like wearing a coat in the winter because I’m in and out of the car all day. It keeps me warm. I wash in warm water and warm dry. Fold right out of the dryer. It’s a bit stretchy and doesn’t wrinkle easily. I’m 5feet tall and 165 lbs and I have larger arms. The medium fits me perfectly. I’m falls just below my bum and the sleeves are a good length and not at all tight. Not thin and also not thick. Big pockets. Comfortable, not scratchy, soft. No pilling, ever. Read more
items.author: ANITA

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Dustyblue, Dustypink, Navy, Khaki, White, Beige, Brickred, Midgrey, Teal, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
